purpose: To democratize investment research by providing tools for financial analysis and market insights.
principle: Utilizes Python libraries for data analysis and visualization, integrating various financial data sources for comprehensive market analysis.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API support, allowing users to extend functionality and integrate with other financial tools.
limitations: Primarily designed for advanced users familiar with financial markets and data analysis; requires Python environment setup.
name: OpenBB
highlight: Comprehensive investment research platform with extensive financial data analysis capabilities.
